forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 85. Southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 64. East northeast wind 1 to 5 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8am and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 88. South wind 1 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
